title: Separate Constants and Variables on Either Side of the Equation
text: We must first simplify each side of the equation to get $$2m-4=5-m$$

title: Simplify
text: Organize the constant to the same side to obtain $$3m=9$$

title: Division
text: We must make the coefficient of the variable equal to $$1$$, so we divide by $$3$$ on both sides to get $$m=3$$
